English: RP-15 is the unassuming hero of the new space era. It may look slow, but slow and steady wins the race. So next time your satellite's overheating, remember: Hot Snail's got your back, one slow coil at a time.
With its winding cooling tube, RP-50 is the ultimate grill master, constantly roasting away the excess heat.

The folks at Meltdown Inc. had a bit of a 'hot mess' on their hands. They tried to Frankenstein two RP-50s together, but it was way too wobbly for anyone's taste. So, they cooked up a bigger, badder radiator to keep their spacecraft frosty. Winter is truly coming this time.
